Trade/Device Name(s): Forsure Rapid One Step Multiple(X) Abuse Drug Screen Test Cup Device for Amphetamine, Methamphetamine, Benzoylecgonine, Benzodiazepine, Marijuana, Morphine, Phencyclidine, Methadone, Oxycodone, Tricyclic Antidepressant, Barbiturates and Propoxyphene
Forsure Rapid One Step Single or Multiple(X) Abuse Drug Screen Test Cup Device
Submitter Information: Tianjin New Bay Bioresearch Co., Ltd.
Regulation Name(s): Amphetamine, Methamphetamine, Benzoylecgonine, Benzodiazepine, Marijuana, Morphine, Phencyclidine, Methadone, Oxycodone, Tricyclic Antidepressant, Barbiturates and Propoxyphene test system
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): Visual read single use test cup device
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Forsure Rapid One Step Multiple(X) Abuse Drug Screen Test Cup Device for qualitative detection of drugs of abuse and metabolites in human urine.
Indications for Use Summary: For qualitative detection of amphetamine, methamphetamine, benzoylecgonine, benzodiazepine, cannabinoid, morphine, phencyclidine, methadone, oxycodone, tricyclic antidepressant, barbiturates, and propoxyphene and their metabolites in human urine at stated cutoff concentrations as a preliminary analytical test, with results intended for use by medical professionals.
